channel.title: YOLO on SwimmingLiu's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in YOLO on SwimmingLiu's Blog

item.title: YOLOSHOW - YOLOv5 / YOLOv7 / YOLOv8 GUI based on Pyside6
item.description: Introduction YOLOSHOW is a graphical user interface (GUI) application embed withYOLOv5 YOLOv7 YOLOv8 algorithm. Functions 1. Support Image / Video / Webcam / Folder (Batch ) Object Detection Choose Image / Video / Webcam / Folder (Batch ) in the menu bar on the left to detect objects. 2. Change Models / Hyper Parameters dynamically When the program is running to detect targets, you can change models / hyper Parameters
